text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    76625-3Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Blood
    44785-4Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] (Maximum value during study) in Serum or Plasma by No addition of P-5'-P
    96586-3Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in DBS
    1742-6Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    1743-4Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by With P-5'-P
    77144-4Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum, Plasma or Blood
    1744-2Alanine aminotransferase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by No addition of P-5'-P
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    9640ALTF
    4705ALT

name: ALT
title: ALT
description: LOINC codes indicating serum ALT measurement Adding proprietary MDA codes
